body:
My screen recorder atm is laggy and delayed. Could you guys please list some that dont lag and is free? thanks

-ebirdy9
body_tagged:
My screen recorder atm is laggy and delayed. Could you guys please list some that dont lag and is free? thanks

-ebirdy9
title: No lag screen recorder?

replies.body: No screen recorder is "Lag free" you just have to lower your settings
replies.body_tagged: No screen recorder is "Lag free" you just have to lower your settings

replies.body:
Yeah, unfortunately for my recordings i am just stuck with Quicktime on Mac, and that can get REALLY laggy, so i would go with HoboMaddy's post of changing your settings just a bit :/
BTW do you upload your videos, ill watch them if you want :)
replies.body_tagged:
Yeah, unfortunately for my recordings i am just stuck with Quicktime on Mac, and that can get REALLY laggy, so i would go with HoboMaddy's post of changing your settings just a bit :/
BTW do you upload your videos, ill watch them if you want :)

replies.body:
"Action!"
Costs: $30

It's way better than fraps, bandicam or pretty much everything else I've tried.
Except for ShadowPlay, but that's only for Nvidia users.
replies.body_tagged:
"Action!"
Costs: $30

It's way better than fraps, bandicam or pretty much everything else I've tried.
Except for ShadowPlay, but that's only for Nvidia users.

replies.body:
obsobsobsbsbsbosbosobosbosboosbosboosbosoboosbosob

obs requires more setup but it's free, no watermark, less lag, and can record as long as you want
